article_title: Charity care requirements scrutinized as part of hospital deregulation talks
article_text:

og.description: As a state work group considers whether to scrap or modify the regulatory system used to approve hospitals and other major new health care services, the fate of millions of dollars of free care provided to the poor is on the table.
